pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Local school districts are looking for volunteers to mentor students interested in world travel. If you have a passion to help others, this is the opportunity for you.
Join us at 2018 3rd Quarterly Consumer Drone Training Session held by Contoso Electronics at Washington State Convention Center on Friday, October 19, 2018 and Saturday, October 2018.
With the remodel in full swing there are several exciting items I wanted to share with you. We have some of the best audio visual equipment being installed into the meeting and conference rooms.
With the remodel in full swing there are several exciting items I wanted to share with you. We have some of the best audio visual equipment being installed into the meeting and conference rooms.
While Contoso has many wonderful customers, we want to highlight one in particular who uses our drones in a completely new and innovative way.

Join your fellow employees as they make a difference in their community! In just Seattle alone, there are hundreds of families who don't have enough extra incoming to make a traditional Thanksgiving dinner. The Contoso Thanksgiving Project plans to reach out to these families to with the goal of putting a turkey on every table. Contoso is donating 50 turkeys to the Seattle Thanksgiving Project, and we need your help to provide the side dishes! We are going to have a competition between the different departments to see which can get the largest number of donations. The winner will get a special happy hour catered for them the week after Thanksgiving. Starting on October 30th there will be boxes set out in the lobby to collect ingredients for different side dishes. Here's what we are looking for:
  • Stuffing mix
  • Gravy mix
  • Cornbread mix
  • Canned pumpkin
  • Canned green beans
  • Cake mix
  • Canned frosting
Last year we did a great job and donated enough to feed 25 families, let's try to double it this year!

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Microsoft launches new AI and HoloLens services for the workplace | VentureBeat

pnp:FieldValue.Value: Microsoft today announced a series of new AI and mixed reality services for workplace software Dynamics 365, including HoloLens-powered tools and intelligence built to make marketing and sales ...
